column1: #Text=Obama supports Middle East protesters in speech
#Text=Strategies of repression and diversion wo n’t work anymore .

#Text=U.S. president Barack Obama has put the support of his administration behind protesters demanding democracy in the Middle East and North Africa , demanded Syrian president Bashar al-Assad embrace reforms or resign , and warned a failure to address the uprisings in the region could lead to deep division between the U.S. and Muslim nations .
#Text=In a speech in Washington , D.C. , Obama said it was a " historic opportunity " for his government to " promote reform , and to support transitions to democracy " in the region .
